summary: A major stadium has introduced smart technology that allows fans to order food, access exclusive content, and navigate the venue through a dedicated smartphone app.
A famous chef and a celebrated author have announced their engagement, having met at a literary awards ceremony earlier this year.
The rugby finals were marred by controversy after a last-minute referee decision that disallowed a potential game-winning try.
A pair of reality TV personalities have confirmed they are dating after meeting on the set of a popular competition show.
The golf championship finals concluded with a veteran player securing his first major title after a tense playoff round.
A popular musician has announced a shift in his career, revealing plans to explore acting roles in an effort to diversify his creative endeavors.
